com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1

Class AlchemyLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.AlchemyService
        • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.alchemy.v1.AlchemyLanguage

  • public class AlchemyLanguage
extends AlchemyService
    The Alchemy Language service uses offers 12 text analysis services, each of which uses sophisticated natural language processing techniques to analyze your content and add high-level semantic information.
    Version:
    v1
    See Also:
    Alchemy Language
